translation.Name: Missing in Action
translation.Description: A recent scavenging run to Lamia ended in disaster when our scavengers ran into a squad of hostile soldiers. Most made it back, however, <color=uncommon>Private Nestor</color> got cut off from the group. It's your job to find him.
translation.Condition_0: Find Out What happened to <color=uncommon>Private Nestor</color>
